Uses of Class
thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2.WebGLTexture

  • Packages that use WebGLTexture 
    Package Description
    thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2
    Here are located all WebGL rendering context related code.
    thothbot.parallax.core.client.textures
    Here are textures which can be used by Materials.

    • Uses of WebGLTexture in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2

      Methods in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2 that return WebGLTexture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WebGLTexture WebGLRenderingContext.createTexture()
      Create a WebGLTexture object and initialize it with a texture object name as if by calling glGenTextures.
      Methods in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2 with parameters of type WebGLTexture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WebGLRenderingContext.bindTexture(TextureTarget target, WebGLTexture texture)
      Bind a named texture to a texturing target.
      void WebGLRenderingContext.deleteTexture(WebGLTexture texture)
      Delete the texture object contained in the passed WebGLTexture as if by calling glDeleteTextures.
      void WebGLRenderingContext.framebufferTexture2D(FramebufferSlot attachment, TextureTarget textarget, int slot, WebGLTexture texture, int level) 
      void WebGLRenderingContext.framebufferTexture2D(FramebufferSlot attachment, TextureTarget textarget, WebGLTexture texture, int level)
      Attach a texture image to a framebuffer object.
      boolean WebGLRenderingContext.isTexture(WebGLTexture texture)
      Return true if the passed RendererObject is a WebGLTexture and false otherwise.
